title: Road and Track
description:
Travis Okulski is Editor in Chief of Road and Track, and Kyle Kinard works for him. Travis tells us about driving a McLaren F1 race car, special BMWs, and what we think of the new Corvette C8. Kyle tells us about the time he rolled a truck! 

 

This show is also a video: https://youtu.be/3LF3QQ4tX6c

Follow us!

Follow us!
T: @thesmokingtire @zackklapman @tokulski @kjkinard
IG: @thesmokingtire @fakezackklapman @tokulski @kjkinard

author: matt@thesmokingtire.com (Matt Farah & Zack Klapman)
